channel.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
channel.description: hi, this is my second post and i want to know which version of directx you guys think will be on the next half life game??? and which hardware should be too?? i think that will still be directx 9.0c (but hoping for 11) because in a podcast interview the guy with gabe newell said that directx 9.0c was "very good and else", and, at least, a quad core processor to make full use of havok physics and 2 gb ram.

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
An interesting idea; what if source comes to the Wii U? Is there anything interesting that could be done with the touchscreen controller and Source games?

Read full topic

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: King_Kaddo
item.description:
blue:

considering the anointment of wii u, we can be pretty sure we will see xbox 720 in a year or two. Its pretty obvious it will use dx11, and since valve greedy as fuck, it will be either a launch title for it or will come soon after.
I dont expect half life 3 to show up before 2013, so dx 11 for sure.

Rumors say that it will be seen at E3 2012 and then released 2013.

Read full topic

item.description:
Khaos124:

Valve sold half-life to Mojang AB, so now all you need is a computer with a working gpu and processor, and boom, 500 fps, on fancy.

You should be sorry for yourself for EVEN daring to think something like that

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
It’s going to require DX5. It was confirmed in late May that Half life 3 is going to be a prequel to Half life 1, and therefore will not be as system demanding as half life 2 and episodes.

Read full topic

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: Sampdel
item.description:
Khaos124:

Half-Life 3
System Requirements

Minimum: 500 mhz processor, 96mb ram, 16mb video card, Windows XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Recommended: 800 mhz processor, 128mb ram, 32mb+ video card, Windows XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

You wont even need a mouse nor keyboard

Read full topic

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: bobbo
item.description:
Calebmcghee:

As for hardware, get 4 gb of ram and an amd 6870 or gtx 560. That would be more than enough to run it.

Nvidia 5(later), (mid-late)6, 7, 8, 9, 200, the very few 300, and 400 series would be more than enough as well.

Pick and choose…

Unless they develop a whole new engine… (which i assume they will not)

Read full topic

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
sersoft:

1024 × 768 px 9.7" display
apple A5 CPU @ 1ghz
64GB flash memory
PowerVR SGX543MP
Multi-touch screen, headset controls, proximity and ambient light sensors, 3-axis accelerometer, digital compass, 3 axis gyro.
Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g/n)
Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR
UMTS / HSDPA (850, 1900, 2100 MHz) GSM / EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz)

blackberry torch also supported

I see u trollan

Read full topic

item.title: HALF LIFE 3 requirements
item.dc:creator: finger
item.description:
For those who can´t read:

i,ve said “which hardware you guys THINK will be”, so it doesnt matter if the game is released or not.
this is just speculation.
When the game comes out, we will not need to speculate because we will have something concrete.
If some of you think this thread has not a point, so don´t reply.

Read full topic
